author: desruisseaux
msg: Refactoring of the test infrastructure in order to fix XML prefix, test Locale and test TimeZone more easily.
For this purpose, we modified MarshallerPool in order to allow the constructor to parse all properties given
in argument, build a template for them and use the template for all (un)marshaller creations. This is likely
to be useful not only for tests, but also in production environment.
